availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin F. Burnam (Trigg County, Kentucky, grocer and farmer )

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer and grocer. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Burnam and Elizabeth A. Burnam. Married to Rebecca Sidney Stanrod Burnam in Trigg County, Kentucky, in March 1861. Father of Yateman Burnam. Farmer in Trigg County in 1850. Grocer in Cadiz in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 314A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 47.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Rock Castle, p. 149B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994056, Trigg County Marriages.
